text: Mr. & Mrs. is a 1992 Indian Malayalam-language film directed by Sajan, written by Rafi Mecartin and produced by K. T. Kunjumon. It stars Siddique and Jagadish. ==Cast== * Jagadish * Ravali (Mythili) * Siddique * Suchitra Murali * Jagathy Sreekumar * Suma Jayaram * Sukumari * Sainudeen * Krishnankutty Nair * Mala Aravindan * Kalpana * Master Vishal * Baby Shilpa * Master Midhun * Sankaradi * Kalabhavan Navas ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Mr & Mrs (1992 film)
